price: Na lau Mwenyezi Mungu angeli penda, wasingeli shiriki. Na Sisi hatukukufanya wewe uwe mtunzaji wao. Wala wewe si mlinzi juu yao.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَآ أَشۡرَكُواْۗ وَمَا جَعَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظٗاۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِوَكِيلٖ
footnotes: Na lau kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu angeli taka wamuabudu Yeye peke yake angeli walazimisha kwa nguvu na kwa uweza wake. Lakini Yeye amewaachilia watumie khiari yao. Na Sisi hatukukufanya wewe kuwa ni muangalizi wao, ukiwahisabia vitendo vyao. Wala wewe hukulazimishwa kuwa usimamie kuwapangia na kuwatengenezea mambo yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaw shāa al-lahu mā ashrakū wamā jaʿalnāka ʿalayhim ḥafīẓan wamā anta ʿalayhim biwakīlin
